sentences.en: By combining the Clockwork Decoy and a common electric light, you can illuminate even the tenebrous tunnels!
sentences.cn: 只要将“发条诱饵装置”和一盏普通的“电灯”组合在一起，你甚至能让整条漆黑的隧道亮如白昼！

sentences.en: Darting, one never knows where, their tenebrous orbs.
sentences.cn: 阴森森的眼珠不知道盯着什么地方.

sentences.en: Two doors along , a rubric stood out from the tenebrous gloom.
sentences.cn: 走过两扇门,黑洞洞的幽暗中显现出注目的题目.
